summary: During the 1700s, pirate Captain Vallo seizes a British warship and gets involved in various money-making schemes involving Caribbean rebels led by El Libre, British envoy Baron Jose Gruda, and a beautiful courtesan named Consuelo.
cast: Burt Lancaster|Nick Cravat|Eva Bartok|Torin Thatcher|James Hayter|Leslie Bradley|Margot Grahame|Noel Purcell|Frederick Leister|Eliot Makeham|Frank Pettingell|Dana Wynter|Christopher Lee|Ewan Roberts|John Chandos|Derek Tansley|Charles Farrell|Violet Farebrother|Enzo Giobbe|Charles Horvath|Harry Lane|Barry Lowe|Vittorio Martinelli|Umberto Sacripante|Dennis Wyndham
